product_name: White Sierra Sierra Stretch Gloves - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: Stash the women's White Sierra Stretch gloves next to your entryway so you can grab them for quick errands in cold weather, or use them for extra warmth during longer winter adventures. Polyester and spandex blend fabric is lightweight, stretchy and very smooth to the touch. Special buy.
